name: Handy and the lost fingers - Team 12
name_original: Handy and the lost fingers - Team 12
description:
PITCH

You play as Handy, a hand who got captured to become an experimental subject. He wants to escape but his fingers has been stolen ! Without them, Handy can't do anything. Help him to find all of his fingers and escape this weird lab. 

GAMEPLAY

"Handy" is a plateformer were you have to get all your fingers back in order to be able to escape. Each fingers will give your character an ability.

With 0 finger : He can barely move

With 1 finger : He can run and jump

You will have to find the rest by yourself

CONTROLS

Move

     or     

Jump

     or     

Attack

     or     

Drop a finger

     or
